name: safer-function
description: Function traps for bind, call, and apply.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm test
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/ && echo 'module.exports = {bind, call, apply};'>>cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/ && echo 'export {bind, call, apply};'>>esm/index.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
